blogs.title: Building Scalable Full-Stack Applications with MERN
blogs.excerpt: Learn how to architect and build scalable full-stack applications using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js. We'll cover best practices, performance optimization, and deployment strategies.
blogs.author: Favour Mayowa

blogs.title: Next.js 15: New Features and Performance Improvements
blogs.excerpt: Explore the latest features in Next.js 15 including improved server components, enhanced caching, and performance optimizations. Perfect for building modern web applications.
blogs.author: Favour Mayowa

blogs.title: TypeScript Best Practices for Large-Scale Projects
blogs.excerpt: Master TypeScript with advanced patterns and best practices for building maintainable, type-safe applications. Includes real-world examples and common pitfalls to avoid.
blogs.author: Favour Mayowa

blogs.title: React Performance Optimization Techniques
blogs.excerpt: Discover proven techniques to optimize React applications for better performance. Learn about memoization, code splitting, lazy loading, and more.
blogs.author: Favour Mayowa

experience.description:
Taught foundational web development technologies, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, to aspiring frontend developers.

Designed and delivered interactive lessons, ensuring students grasped key concepts through hands-on projects and real-world examples.

Provided mentorship and guidance to students, helping them build strong technical skills and confidence in web development.

I enrolled in a tech school to advance my skills as a Full-Stack Web Developer. During my studies, I gained hands-on experience with diverse tech stacks, including Angular, MongoDB, Node.js, Express.js, React, Vue.js, SQL, and PHP. Alongside technical skills, I developed strong communication abilities, learning to present and pitch ideas effectively. This experience has equipped me with a well-rounded foundation for success in the tech industry.
experience.location: Old Ilorin Road, Opposite Yoaco Filling Station, Yoaco, Ogbomoso.

experience.description:
Developed a seamless car tour booking platform for city tours, akin to ride-hailing services like Uber.

Built an intuitive user interface to simplify navigation, destination selection, and booking management.

Designed and implemented the admin dashboard, including key features such as the Transactions page, Payments, Settings, Driver Verification, and Driver Management.

Implemented responsive designs, ensuring consistent user experiences across devices.

Developed the user-side interface to manage orders and products using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

Created responsive designs and interactive features to enhance usability.

Delivered clean, efficient code to ensure optimal performance and scalability.

projects.title: FinFlow Web
projects.description: A modern fintech web application built with Next.js 16, Supabase, TailwindCSS, and ShadCN UI, Typescript. Inspired by Cowrywise, FinFlow helps users automate their savings, invest in diverse portfolios, and achieve their financial goals.

projects.title: Code Arena
projects.description: Full-stack, class-based web application that turns coding practice into an interactive terminal experience. Built with Next.js, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, and ShadCN/UI, Supabase, it lets developers solve LeetCode-style problems directly inside a sleek, hacker-themed interface â€” solo or collaboratively in real-time.

projects.title: Trade Vault Web
projects.description: Access institutional-grade trading tools, real-time market analysis, and portfolio optimization designed for wealth accumulation and risk management.

projects.title: Facial-Web Attendance System
projects.description: A modern, full-featured attendance management system for colleges using facial recognition technology. Built with Next.js, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, ShadCN UI, and Appwrite.
